body:
Ref. Nº: ESM/WIN/008/05/10/MA
Batch. Nº: EULO/2907/444/908/07. 

This mail is to inform the user of this email address, that your email 
has won our star-prize $950,000.00 (Nine Hundred And Fifty Thousand 
dollars.Only), from EURO MILLIONS NATIONAL LOTTERY, 2007 promo.

You are to respond to this notice so that we will confirm if 
this email address is still truely existing. 

To file your claim, please contact our claims officer details below:

National Agency
Dr.Smith Gonzalez
E-mail: contact_euromillionoffice09@yahoo.es

Yours faithfully,
Mrs.: Jolen Jones .
EURO MILLION ONLINE LOTTERY DIRECTOR.
Spain Branch.
